# Class Schedule - Subject to Change

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
class.schedule = read.csv("class-schedule-revised-23JUN2025.csv")
class.schedule = select(class.schedule, -1)
colnames(class.schedule) = c("Day", "Date", "Topic Focus", "What's Due?", "Suggested Readings - Brady and Weil 4th ed", "Lab Unit")

kbl(class.schedule, format = "html") %>%
kable_styling("bordered", full_width = F, fixed_thead = T, html_font = "arial") %>%
  pack_rows("Week 1", 1,2, background = "grey80") %>%
  pack_rows("Week 2", 3,5, color = "grey80") %>%
  pack_rows("Week 3", 6,8) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 4", 9,11) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 5", 12,14) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 6", 15,17) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 7", 18,20) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 8", 21,23) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 9", 24,26) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 10", 27,29) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 11", 30,32) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 12", 33,35) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 13", 36,38) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 14", 39,41) %>%
  pack_rows("Week 15", 42,43) %>%
```
